nodes.bodyText: What is actually the difference in JS?
its just our prettier settings, we can change it to " instead of '
We should think about removing the attributes width, height, x,y  from the API. These are leftovers from times when to hex map was drawn in the frontend.
Pls check if this appears at all. ProvidedBy is a shortcut for configuring landscapes long before internal processing is done.

OK. Then we should do #137 later.
see LandscapeDTO, I think overallState has been removed
yeah i wasn't sure if it was in before because we always had no data for it, i'll remove it for now
We can leave this for now. I've made a wireframe to discuss future changes.
no we cant because it doesnt work anymore this way, we wont get html served anymore and we cant convert json to html :/
